resources.string: This feature is only available in the Premium version, to purchase it press the buy button. When buying the premium version you support future development of Smooth Calendar.
Support development and unlock extra features by buying the premium version
Thanks for buying the premium version, it helps support development
Should the icon be displayed, if so, where?
Event end time is not displayed
Today\'s and tomorrows date are replaced
Today\'s and tomorrows date are not replaced
Events occurring today are shown in a different color
Events occurring today are shown in the same color as all other events
When the widget is touched a menu is displayed
When the widget is touched the calendar is displayed
Display the calendar color next to the event
Do not display the calendar color next to the event
The text will be the same color as the calendar it came from
The text will be the default text color
Remove events when they end instead of when they start
Times will be displayed as AM/PM
Skip this many events before starting the display
Number of days to display events from

Thanks for installing Smooth Calendar.\n\nSmooth Calendar is a widget and you can add it to your homescreen by long pressing on the homescreen and then select widgets and then select Smooth Calendar. If you are using Android 4.0 or later you will find the widgets in the application drawer under the widget tab, just drag Smooth Calendar to your homescreen.
Display the event date in this format
Display the event time in this format
Settings for number of items, font and background when the device is in portrait position
Settings for number of items, font and background when the device is in landscape position
Select which calendars to display events from
Select which calendar application to use
Events from this calendar will be displayed
Events from this calendar will not be displayed
What background, if any, to use
Each date will only be displayed once
The date will be repeated on each line
What color to use for today\'s events
What color to use for the event text
What color to use for the widget background
All day events are displayed in a different color
All day events will be displayed in the same color as all other events
What color to use for all day events
What color to use for the top part of the calendar icon
What style to use for the text
Disable multiple instances, all instances will use the same settings
Enable multiple instances, each instance have their own settings
Debug messages are written to the log
Debug messages are not written to the log
What color should the calendar that the birthdays are stored in have
The amount of padding to add to the widget
Tasks from this list will be displayed
Tasks from this list will not be displayed
Select which task lists to display tasks from
The width of the color bar
The width of padding before the color bar
The width of padding after the color bar
How much padding to add to the left side of the widget
How much padding to add to the right side of the widget
How much padding to add to the top side of the widget
How much padding to add to the bottom side of the widget
Use different configuration based on if the device is in portrait or landscape mode
Use the same configuration no matter the device orientation
All events spanning more than one day aren\'t shown
All events spanning more than one day are shown
Smooth Calendar has stopped working, please send a report to the developer to help fix the issue!
Unexpected error, please send a report…
Please click here to help fix the issue.
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK.
You might add your comments about the problem below:
ACRA, the debuging tool, is disabled
ACRA, the debuging tool, is enabled
Go directly to the calendar item
Tapping an calendar item will open it
tapping an calendar item will open the calendar
The widget will scroll to show more items
Active events are displayed in a different color
Active events will be displayed in the same color as all other events
What color to use for active events
Show active multiday spanning events as starting today
Show active multiday spanning events true start time
What custom font to use when rendering items
The color to assignt to tasks when using the show color option
Export the current widget settings so that they can be restored later
Enter the filename to save these settings as
Import and apply settings to this widget

Events occurring tomorrow are shown in a different color
Events occurring tomorrow are shown in the same color as all other events
What color to use for tomorrow\'s events
Select which items to show and their order
All day events will be displayed last in each day
All day events will be displayed first in each day
